title: Recent Influx of Chinese players
body:
Over the past few months on the OCE server i have noticed more and more Chinese players on OCE which isn't a problem except for the fact majority of them don't speak English on a English speaking server and its quite infuriating when your trying to communicate and they type out Chinese characters im not racist but this is a English speaking server on a game that rely's on teamwork.

Not saying this stereotype is true but majority of these players are Riven mains, who also tend to be a bit salty with their infamous words "sb" Im not saying its true or anything im just voicing my opinion and pointing it out that this is happening.

Don't the Chinese players have their own server? It's getting to a point now where im getting a non english player per game and its hard to communicate with them.

Riot should do something about this soon i know they are busy with the Pre-season changes which im excited for! but a comment from a Rioter with their opinion will leave me happy.
Once again not pointing fingers or trying to be racist just saying what ive seen over the past few months
